content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content:
Hello Hassan, it's great to meet you. I understand that you're interested in renting the apartment for a period of time. Let's discuss the rental price.

I'm willing to negotiate a fair rental price that meets your needs while also maximizing my gains as a landlord. However, I must emphasize that the apartment is only 25 square meters, so I do have certain limitations in terms of what price I can offer.

That being said, I am open to hearing your rental price proposal. What do you have in mind?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I want to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible. What do you propose?

I am dependable and responsible, and I want to be on good terms with my landlord.

I understand that the apartment is only 25 square meters, but I am open to negotiation. What is the minimum rental price you can offer?
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content:
Thank you for your response, Hassan. While I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, I must emphasize that I am a landlord, and my primary goal is to maximize my gains. With that in mind, I am sorry to say that I cannot offer the lowest possible rental price for this apartment.

That being said, I am willing to discuss a fair rental price that takes into account the size of the apartment and my need to maximize my gains. Based on my calculations, I am willing to offer a rental price of 500 Euros per month.

I understand that this is higher than what you were looking for, but I hope you can appreciate my position as a landlord. If you have any questions or concerns, please feel free to ask.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Thank you for your proposal, Mister Heine. I accept the rental price of 500 Euros per month. Thank you for your time and consideration.

I am dependable and responsible, and I want to be on good terms with my landlord.

I understand that the apartment is only 25 square meters, but I am open to negotiation.

I will make sure to pay the rent on time and in full.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content:
Thank you for your prompt response, Hassan. I appreciate your willingness to accept my rental price proposal, and I look forward to working with you as a tenant.

As a landlord, I am committed to ensuring that the apartment is well-maintained and that you have a positive experience living there. Please feel free to reach out to me if you have any questions or concerns in the future.

Thank you again for your commitment to paying the rent on time and in full. I look forward to our continued partnership.
name: Heinrich Heine
